reviews.text: Price is great, rooms are big and clean (especially the suites, they're worth the extra few bucks) but no alcohol or smoking on site. This facility is also a Christian Conference Center so their will be subtle and obvious religious themes but it's no big deal and if it is a big deal you'll get over it.
reviews.title: Nice as long as you can tolerate the unique rules

reviews.text: The place is out of the way. There really isn't anything nearby. The beach is maybe about 10 minutes driving, but it felt like I was in the middle of nowhere - definitely need a vehicle if you stay here.

reviews.text: Now about the hotel itself - it's not really a hotel. It's like a conference center, Christian community gathering place that happens to offer rooms to the public. There's prayer available 24/7 and all sorts of Christian religious events. I didn't mind a whole lot but definitely not for everyone.
reviews.title: Cheap no thrills rent a car
Stay Away
reviews.text: First, this is not a hotel - it is a conference center. The rooms are large (we had 2 suites) but with no amenities (just a small bar of soap) and the furniture is worn, almost ratty. Then, after we checked out, there was a charge to my credit card (I was not notified) for damage that we did not do. I can't say whether this charge was merely mistake or worse, but I advise you to stay away.
